data.message: You are a joke of a man I thought you stood for something growing up but clearly I never paid full attention to some of your lyrics that is until I was woken and realized you stand for the new world order and now with your recent attack of trump in one of your songs clearly symbolizes that you are a sell out pussy who stands for nothing at least nothing good for society as a whole.
